org.lrima.laop.simulation.map

Interface LineCollidable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProximityLineSensor, SimpleCar

    public interface LineCollidable
    Interface for all objects that can collide with a line (like a car)
    Author:
    LÃ©onard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bake()
      Called before each step to pre-calculate the controls of x1, x2, y1, y2 (faster that way).
      void collide(StaticLineObject line)
      Called when there is the possibility that the line is touching the car.
      float getX1() 
      float getX2() 
      float getY1() 
      float getY2() 

    • Method Detail

      • collide

        void collide(StaticLineObject line)
        Called when there is the possibility that the line is touching the car. Must check if its really touching. If it is, it must react properly
        Parameters:
        line - the line

      • bake

        void bake()
        Called before each step to pre-calculate the controls of x1, x2, y1, y2 (faster that way).

      • getX1

        float getX1()
        Returns:
        the x coordinate of the first point forming the bound

      • getY1

        float getY1()
        Returns:
        the y coordinate of the first point forming the bound

      • getX2

        float getX2()
        Returns:
        the x coordinate of the second point forming the bound

      • getY2

        float getY2()
        Returns:
        the y coordinate of the second point forming the bound
